The Related Discourses

7. Abodes of Mindfulness (cf. SN 47: Satipaṭṭhāna saṃyutta)

The Abodes of Mindfulness group consists of 54 sutras when abbreviated sutra variants are counted. The material is found in fascicle 24 of Taisho No. 99. Below is a list of the English translations currently available.

Note: Previous English translations currently available at SuttaCentral are referenced below. The reader should be aware that titles for SA sutras are supplied by the translator(s). The sutra numbering follows Yinshun’s reconstruction. The Taisho sutra numbers are noted for reference ("[T 99.xxx]").

  • 2. Bases of Mindfulness (Pierquet) [T 99.606]
  • 8. Correct Mindfulness (Pierquet) [T 99.610]
  • 18. Bhikṣuṇī Residence [T 99.615]
  • 23. The Monkey (Pierquet) [T 99.620]
  • 24. The Young Monks [T 99.621]
  • 26. The World Beauty [T 99.623]
